product_description: Almost like having two tops in one, this split-back tank can be tied for a slim, flattering fit or worn open for an easier look.
product_details_and_care:
Almost like having two tops in one, this split-back tank can be tied for a slim, flattering fit or worn open for an easier look.

27" length (size 2X)
